GET.consentDisplayName: Read and write your organization's application configuration policies
GET.consentDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's application configuration policies on your behalf.  This includes policies such as activityBasedTimeoutPolicy, claimsMappingPolicy, homeRealmDiscoveryPolicy, tokenIssuancePolicy  and tokenLifetimePolicy.
